title: looking for support to my mordekaiser (ranked duo)
body:
I'm in Gold 5 and actually used to play Mordekaiser a lot since season 3 with good success. The new Mordekaiser is lackluster as a solo laner but in my opinion he is a very strong bot lane carry now. It is very different from supporting an adc because Morde does well with an aggressive style. I need less protection than  a normal adc but instead i need others to initiate and hold the enemy down while i bring down the pain.
Morde is a very snowbally carry who has a good early laning phase and very strong mid game. What I need is an aggressive tanky support with good initiate. cc is important and peel is nice. If you can play Nautilus, Leona, Thresh, Blitz, Alistar (only if you're good with the combo) that is optimal, but Morgana, Lulu, and Nami are decent too.

Please post with:
current rank 
top 3 supports
times you are free to play (I'm in Jerusalem Time Zone)
how much ham can you handle?

replies.body:
I'd offer to help you if I didnt like playing him so much XP

Unranked fyi
